tasks.task: Determine whether to purchase flow control valves for irrigation systems.
subtasks: Assess if multiple sprinkler zones with different pressure requirements exist.
Understand the pressure needs for rotors and spray heads.
Identify the issue of misting caused by high pressure in spray head zones.
Recognize the solution of installing flow control valves to adjust pressure.

tasks.task: Consider the necessity of flow control valves for proper irrigation.
subtasks: Compare the water pressure requirements for rotors and spray heads.
Evaluate the consequences of excessive pressure on spray heads.
Research how to adjust water pressure using flow control valves.
Explore resources for learning about flow control valves and irrigation.

tasks.task: Evaluate Sprinkler Warehouse's offerings and customer service.
subtasks: Note the store's complete range for irrigation needs.
Consider contacting customer service for assistance.
Subscribe to the YouTube channel for future tutorials and tips.

tasks.task: Understand the video's context at USC and the recommendation.
subtasks: Realize the video's inauthenticity by mentioning being at USC.
Acknowledge the potential for opinion bias from the speaker.
Disregard the recommendation as it lacks sincerity and may not be relevant.
Determine if the system has multiple zones with differing sprinkler types (rotors and spray heads).
Check pressure requirements for rotors (minimum 50 psi) and spray heads (best at 30 psi).
Understand the problem of misting in spray head zones due to high pressure (50 psi).
Recognize the solution of installing flow control valves in spray head zones to adjust pressure.
Research how flow control valves work to manage water pressure.
Explore other resources (e.g., detailed videos) for better understanding.
Note Sprinkler Warehouse's claim to have everything for irrigation needs.
Consider the possibility of needing to contact customer service for help.
Subscribe to the channel for future educational content.
